description.narrative: To attract funding to foster growth, BMI and Berendina Stichting are committed to an alternative legal and organizational structure. A consultant is appointed to advise on the update of BMI's 3 year strategic plan, including an analysis of the present organizational model governance structure and current social performance measurement system and assessment of the appropriate ICT software solution. A parallel study will also be carried out to identify the most appropriate legal structure.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands
